#summary How to install and run the system.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

In order to run the system, you need to [http://code.google.com/p/limbo-machine/source checkout the source code]. Please note that the code should be accessible from Inferno.

  * Start Inferno
  $ emu
  * Go to the limbo-machine directory
  * Build and run the server program
  ; mk clean build start
  * Then open a browser (firefox is the only supported browser as for now) on your native OS and go to file://<limbo.machine.home>/js/sample.html
  * To stop the system
  ; mk stop
